metadata.title: Murine sarcoma virus transformation of BALB/3T3 cells: lack of dependence on murine leukemia virus

abstract.original_text: publicly funded repositories, such as the WHO COVID database with rights for unrestricted research re-use and analyses in any form or by any means with acknowledgement of the original source.
